title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.7 - Personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.7 - Personnel

State Regulations

The personnel necessary for the administration of defense
emergency aid shall be assigned from the local departments of social services, supplemented by others recruited from related governmental and private
agencies, and the public at large in sufficient numbers to carry out the
responsibilities of local social services commissioners as defined in this Part
and other related guidance materials. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
508.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
